item.description:
The first screening of this film will be in the ostentatious Harvard Film Archive, (HFA). Since the director will be there it will be an exciting screening.
Three members of the Army's elite Explosive Ordnance Disposal squad battle insurgents and each other as they search for and disarm a wave of roadside bombs on the streets of Baghdadâ€”in order to try and make the city a safer place for Iraqis and Americans alike.

item.name: The Hurt Locker, Movie starts at 7PM get there as close to 6PM as Possible
